name: Who Am I? (Post-It Game)
description: Who Am I? is a guessing game where players have a name of a famous person or character stuck to their forehead and have to guess who it is by asking yes/no questions.
basicRules: Each player writes the name of a famous person or character on a post-it note and sticks it on the forehead of the person to their left, without them seeing it.
On your turn, you ask the other players yes/no questions to try to figure out who you are.
For example, you could ask 'Am I a man?', 'Am I a fictional character?', 'Am I a singer?'.
If you get a 'yes' answer, you can ask another question. If you get a 'no' answer, your turn ends.
The first person to guess who they are wins the game.
tips: Start with broad questions and then get more specific.
Listen to the questions other people are asking, as it might give you clues about who you are.
